text:
I was working on templates > partials > footer.html and it wasn't working quite how I expected. I tried editing in Global Content Editor, but noticed that I wasn't able to fetch these changes back into code. How can I either:
1. Clear out the global content editor for the footer to use my theme templates > partials > footer.html, _*OR*_
2. Edit the footer I made in the global content editor to update in code?
